title: Motion in 2D - rock thrown from a height

content.question: A rock is thrown from a height <math alttext="h sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> with an initial speed <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> at an angle <math alttext="theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>θ</mi></math> above the horizontal. Which of the following expressions represents the time the rock takes to reach the ground after the rock is thrown?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 v sub 0, end sub, times the sine of theta, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, end sub, times the sine of theta, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, end sub, times the sine of theta, minus the square root of v sub 0, end sub, squared, times the sine squared of theta, plus 2 g times h sub 0, end root, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>−</mo><msqrt><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></msqrt></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, end sub, times the sine of theta, plus the square root of v sub 0, end sub, squared, times the sine squared of theta, plus 2 g times h sub 0, end root, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><msqrt><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></msqrt></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator v sub 0, end sub, times the sine of theta, plus the square root of v sub 0, end sub, squared, times the sine squared of theta, plus 2 g times h sub 0, end root, and denominator g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>sin</mi><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><msqrt><msubsup><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn><mn>2</mn></msubsup><msup><mi>sin</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>θ</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>h</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></msqrt></mrow><mi>g</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 1.5: Motion in Two or Three Dimensions

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
